subject: problems with apt update
body:
Hiya, I always seem to get errors when I do an "apt update", is this a 
problem on the repository itself, or on my end, or possibly a timeout in 
the connection due to my connection being a crappy modem?
[root@spawn root]# apt-get update
Hit redhat/7.2/i386/base/pkglist.gnomehide
Hit redhat/7.2/i386/base/pkglist.os
Ign redhat/7.2/i386 release.os
Err redhat/7.2/i386/base/pkglist.updates
 Bad header line
Hit redhat/7.2/i386 release.updates
Err redhat/7.2/i386/base/pkglist.freshrpms
 400 Bad Request
Err redhat/7.2/i386 release.freshrpms
 Bad header line
Hit redhat/7.2/i386/base/srclist.freshrpms
Ign redhat/7.2/i386 release.gnomehide
Ign redhat/7.2/i386/base/mirrors
Hit redhat/7.2/i386 release.freshrpms
Ign redhat/7.2/i386/base/mirrors
Ign redhat/7.2/i386/base/mirrors
Ign redhat/7.2/i386/base/mirrors
Ign redhat/7.2/i386/base/mirrors
Failed to fetch 
/redhat/7.2/i386/base/pkglist.updates
 Bad header line
Failed to fetch 
/redhat/7.2/i386/base/pkglist.freshrpms
 400 Bad Request
Failed to fetch 
/redhat/7.2/i386/base/release.freshrpms
 Bad header line
